quote: Whatever your life's work is, do it well. A man should do his job so well that the living, the dead, and the unborn could do it no better.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: I put my heart and my soul into my work, and have lost my mind in the process.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The reward for work well done is the opportunity to do more.
author: Jonas Salk

quote: Find a job you like and you add five days to every week.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Individual commitment to a group effort - that is what makes a team work, a company work, a society work, a civilization work.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Let the beauty of what you love be what you do.
author: Rumi

quote: Let us realize that: the privilege to work is a gift, the power to work is a blessing, the love of work is success!
author: David O. McKay

quote: All things are difficult before they are easy.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Be regular and orderly in your life, so that you may be violent and original in your work.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives satisfaction.
author: Anne Frank

quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: All life demands struggle. Those who have everything given to them become lazy, selfish, and insensitive to the real values of life. The very striving and hard work that we so constantly try to avoid is the major building block in the person we are today.
author: Pope Paul VI

quote: Nothing will work unless you do.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The pay is good and I can walk to work.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Quality is everyone's responsibility.
author: W. Edwards Deming

quote: Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don't turn up at all.
author: Sam Ewing

quote: Work is the curse of the drinking classes.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Working hard and working smart sometimes can be two different things.
author: Byron Dorgan

quote: When your work speaks for itself, don't interrupt.
author: Henry J. Kaiser

quote: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Without labor nothing prospers.
author: Sophocles

quote: The power of one, if fearless and focused, is formidable, but the power of many working together is better.
author: Gloria Macapagal Arroyo

quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
author: Harry Golden

quote: The beginning is the most important part of the work.
author: Plato

quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.
author: Ann Landers

quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
author: Robert Frost

quote: I've learned from experience that if you work harder at it, and apply more energy and time to it, and more consistency, you get a better result. It comes from the work.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: Nothing ever comes to one, that is worth having, except as a result of hard work.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Honor lies in honest toil.
author: Grover Cleveland

quote: It is the working man who is the happy man. It is the idle man who is the miserable man.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Organizing is what you do before you do something, so that when you do it, it is not all mixed up.
author: A. A. Milne

quote: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
author: George Burns

quote: All wealth is the product of labor.
author: John Locke

quote: He who seeks rest finds boredom. He who seeks work finds rest.
author: Dylan Thomas

quote: A man's work is nothing but this slow trek to rediscover, through the detours of art, those two or three great and simple images in whose presence his heart first opened.
author: Albert Camus

quote: It's like Forrest Gump said, 'Life is like a box of chocolates.' Your career is like a box of chocolates - you never know what you're going to get. But everything you get is going to teach you something along the way and make you the person you are today. That's the exciting part - it's an adventure in itself.
author: Nick Carter

quote: Work is much more fun than fun.
author: Noel Coward

quote: Work is love made visible. And if you cannot work with love but only with distaste, it is better that you should leave your work and sit at the gate of the temple and take alms of those who work with joy.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Before you start some work, always ask yourself three questions - Why am I doing it, What the results might be and Will I be successful. Only when you think deeply and find satisfactory answers to these questions, go ahead.
author: Chanakya

quote: Good things happen to those who hustle.
author: Chuck Noll

quote: The supreme accomplishment is to blur the line between work and play.
author: Arnold J. Toynbee

quote: Inspiration comes of working every day.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: To find joy in work is to discover the fountain of youth.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: I believe in stopping work and eating lunch.
author: L'Wren Scott

quote: I guess we all like to be recognized not for one piece of fireworks, but for the ledger of our daily work.
author: Neil Armstrong

quote: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: And where I excel is ridiculous, sickening, work ethic. You know, while the other guy's sleeping? I'm working.
author: Will Smith

quote: Economics is extremely useful as a form of employment for economists.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: Work is a necessary evil to be avoided.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Careers, like rockets, don't always take off on time. The trick is to always keep the engine running.
author: Gary Sinise

quote: Let us touch the dying, the poor, the lonely and the unwanted according to the graces we have received and let us not be ashamed or slow to do the humble work.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: For me, every day is a new thing. I approach each project with a new insecurity, almost like the first project I ever did. And I get the sweats. I go in and start working, I'm not sure where I'm going. If I knew where I was going I wouldn't do it.
author: Frank Gehry

quote: Life grants nothing to us mortals without hard work.
author: Horace

quote: Never continue in a job you don't enjoy. If you're happy in what you're doing, you'll like yourself, you'll have inner peace. And if you have that, along with physical health, you will have had more success than you could possibly have imagined.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: Unemployment is capitalism's way of getting you to plant a garden.
author: Orson Scott Card

quote: I think the person who takes a job in order to live - that is to say, for the money - has turned himself into a slave.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: I have been up against tough competition all my life. I wouldn't know how to get along without it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Working hard is very important. You're not going to get anywhere without working extremely hard.
author: George Lucas
